content: David Taniar - Monash University David Taniar public CV View Scopus Profile David Taniar Assoc Professor Associate Professor, Department of Software Systems & CybersecurityVictorian Heart Institute (VHI) https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8862-3960 EmailDavid.Taniarmonashedu 1997 …2025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyDavid Taniar is an Associate Professor in the Faculty of Information Technology, Monash University.Monash teaching commitmentAssociate Professor David Taniar has experience as the Chief Examiner for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT1004 Data management FIT3003 Business intelligence and data warehousing FIT3107 Advanced programming for database applications FIT4038 Database management and implementation FIT5043 Distributed database FIT5059 Advanced programming for database applications FIT5137 Database analysis and processing David has experience as the Lecturer for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT1004 Data management FIT2077 Advanced data management FIT3003 Business intelligence and data warehousing FIT3107 Advanced programming for database applications FIT4038 Database management and implementation FIT5059 Advanced programming for database applications FIT5137 Database analysis and processing Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
